blogPost.title: What is it like to work as a radio jockey? Answer by Sayema Rahman, Radio Jockey/ Artist. https://t.co/iFh5FtchWw https://t.co/lvnO8vVB3m
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: ラジオジョッキーの仕事はどんなものですか？Answer by Sayema Rahman, Radio Jockey/ Artist. https://t.co/iFh5FtchWw https://t.co/lvnO8vVB3m
作为一名广播骑师的工作是怎样的？回答者：Sayema Rahman，广播骑师/艺术家。https://t.co/iFh5FtchWw https://t.co/lvnO8vVB3m
作爲一名廣播騎師的工作是怎樣的？回答者：Sayema Rahman，廣播騎師/藝術家。https://t.co/iFh5FtchWw https://t.co/lvnO8vVB3m

localize.full_text: 社会人になる前に言われたかったことは何ですか？Answer by @JonWonsulting, CEO @wonsulting. https://t.co/KBL6fhCwZ8 https://t.co/Zu5sRmuuQc
你希望在参加工作之前有人告诉你什么事情？回答者：@JonWonsulting, CEO @wonsulting. https://t.co/KBL6fhCwZ8 https://t.co/Zu5sRmuuQc
